pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, October 7, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:00 a.m.  The Prime Minister will virtually attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m.  The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

Media appearances

8:10 a.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on ICI Radio-Canada Première Montreal.

8:25 a.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on Cogeco Mauricie.
